channel.title: etcd on Leebai's Blogs
channel.description: Recent content in etcd on Leebai's Blogs

item.title: etcd配置项
item.description: etcd配置项 member相关 --name 'default' Human-readable name for this member. --data-dir '${name}.etcd' Path to the data directory. --wal-dir '' Path to the dedicated wal directory. --snapshot-count '100000' Number of committed transactions to trigger a snapshot to disk. --heartbeat-interval '100' Time (in milliseconds) of a heartbeat interval. --election-timeout '1000' Time (in milliseconds) for an election to timeout. See tuning

item.title: Etcd lease机制
item.description: Etcd lease 什么是Etcd的lease机制 lease机制能够确保一个etcd集群中的key拥有一种临时性的特征，被指定某个lease的key只能在集

item.title: Etcd初探
item.description: Etcd初探 什么是Etcd etcd是一个拥有强一致性、分布式键值存储特性，能够提供一种可靠方式来存储数据，能够被分布式系统或者某个集群访问的
